author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
RELIGION

Sri Kannanur Mariamman and Sri Kundathu Kaliamman Temple: 47th Thirukkalyanam, and 18th Kundam festival, special pujas, Pappanaickenpalayam, 7 a.m.

CULTURE

Kasthuri Sreenivasan Trust: Coimbatore Artists Meet, and 146TH painting exhibition, Art Gallery, Avanashi Road, 10 a.m.

GENERAL

Codissia and Sidbi Industrial Services: Counselling and guidance to entrepreneurs, Codissia conference hall, Huzur Road, 3 p.m.

KSG College of Arts and Science: NSS camp, sports competitions for school students, PU school, Peedampalli, 9.30 a.m.

All Christians Federation: Blood donation camp to mark Good Friday, CMCH, 8 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
